trans-unit.source: Learn about how some of our customers have been using Azure Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how some of our customers have been using Azure Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: Data Factory is a cloud-based information management service that automates the movement and transformation of data.
trans-unit.target: Data Factory is a cloud-based information management service that automates the movement and transformation of data.

trans-unit.source: Customers across many industries use Data Factory and other Azure services to build their analytics pipelines and solve their business problems.
trans-unit.target: Customers across many industries use Data Factory and other Azure services to build their analytics pipelines and solve their business problems.

trans-unit.source: Learn directly from our customers how and why they are using Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: Learn directly from our customers how and why they are using Data Factory.
